channel.title: Help with making items stackable/nonstackable
channel.description:
ok, the other day i decided to start a new souce other 1 blowed, anyways my coins weren't stackable fixed it no problem, started checking over skills, exp, ect. and my magic amulets or something stack up, i looked through and couldn't find anything on it being stackable (in item.java) any idea, why/how to fix?
any help is GREATLY appreciated.

item.title: Help with making items stackable/nonstackable
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Guys to make unstackable go into item.java

Search

itemStackable[counter] = false;

Should see something like this:

public static int SmithingItems[][] = new int[5][5]; static { int counter = 0; int c; try { FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File( "data/stackable.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; } dataIn.close(); itemStackable[6685] = false; itemStackable[6687] = false; itemStackable[6689] = false; itemStackable[6691] = false; itemStackable[6570] = false; itemStackable[6737] = false; int[] runeId = {553, 3706, 6430, 6432, 565, 6428, 6422, 566, 6434, 6424 }; for (int i = 0; i < runeId.length; i++) { itemStackable[runeId[i]] = true; } } catch (IOException e) { System.out .println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:"); e.printStackTrace(); }
Under the last stackable thing add this

			itemStackable[####] = false;

Replace #### With item id and there you go its not stackable and if you want a non stackable item stackable change the false to true

Read full topic

item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

firecape. i found out how to make something non stackable. But i don’t know what 2 put.

search for this in item.java

System.out.println(“Critical error while loading notedata! Trace:”);

and add something above it, but theres nothing above it
